title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official CLI and Python/JS bindings to run Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma and other open LLMs locally with one command.

title: ollama-python
summary: First-party Python library that wraps the Ollama REST API for chat, generate, embed and model management.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official npm package offering TypeScript/JavaScript client for browser, Node and Deno with full Ollama API coverage.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration providing Ollama LLM, chat and embeddings wrappers for LangChain Python apps.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Open-source ChatGPT-style web interface for Ollama featuring markdown, code highlighting, model switching and multi-user support.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client library for Ollama with async, streaming, and model management utilities.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem exposing the complete Ollama REST API for Ruby & Rails developers.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community-enhanced interactive CLI with fuzzy model search, conversation history and prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local Ollama models as inline Copilot suggestions and chat panel.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart for deploying Ollama server and models on Kubernetes clusters with GPU support.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official container images (CPU & CUDA) with docker-compose examples for one-line local deployment.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration enabling Ollama models as generators and embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community-maintained .NET client for Ollama with async streaming and strongly-typed responses.

title: ollama-ui
summary: Minimal React-based chat UI that connects to local Ollama server via REST API.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin to run local LLMs through Ollama for note summarization and Q&A.

title: ollama-nim
summary: Nim language wrapper for Ollama API with synchronous and asynchronous HTTP clients.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing typed bindings and streaming support for the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-qt
summary: Cross-platform Qt6 desktop GUI for Ollama with model manager and chat interface.

title: ollama-dlang
summary: D language client for Ollama using std.net.curl and std.json for local LLM inference.

title: ollama-zig
summary: Zig client library for Ollama with comptime JSON parsing and cross-compilation support.
